text: 16:15 Aposel 16:33; 18:8Egha a ko an gara dɨpenir vamɨran itir darasi, e me ruegha gɨvazɨ, a uan dɨpenimɨn mangasa en gighami. A kamaghɨn e mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ia kamaghɨn na gɨnɨghnɨgh suam, kɨ guizbangɨra nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Ekiamɨn ikɨ, kamaghɨn ia izɨ nan dɨpenimɨn ikɨ.” A kamaghɨn e mɨgɨa bar e gakaghone.
